attributes.action: Adopt some of the imigration policies surguested by the BNP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think the prime minister should stop this weak policies on imigration that have caused such a boom in the population, getting rid of counsil houses for the BRITISH homeless on our streets!! insted he should use some on the BNP's ideas but without the violence
